necessary

correctly & clean if

Figure 4 -
Figure 5

Maintenance
Checklist

Maintenance
Checklist

Figure 6

Figure 10

•  Please ensure that the Blue cloth is always used for food contact surfaces when wiping down for post maintenance cleaning i.e. Aluminium Rollers,

Rubber Roller, and Punches & Packing Table.
If the Blue Cloth does get contaminated with grease and/or other lubricants, please discard of immediately and issue a new one.

•
•  Ensure that frames of machines, rails where excess grease may be, must be wiped down with a rag. This rag cannot be used for any food contact surfaces.
•  No Blue Cloths to be used for wiping of grease and other lubricants.

Controlled Copy

couples & check that
the wires don’t get in

cracks in plates, wipe
with brown scotch
bright and replace

•  Please ensure that the Blue cloth is always used for food contact surfaces when wiping down for post maintenance cleaning i.e. Aluminium Rollers,

Rubber Roller, and Punches & Packing Table.
If the Blue Cloth does get contaminated with grease and/or other lubricants, please discard of immediately and issue a new one.

•  Ensure that frames of machines, rails where excess grease may be, must be wiped down with a rag. This rag cannot be used for any food contact surfaces.
•  No Blue Cloths to be used for wiping of grease and other lubricants.

Rubber Draw Roller

-

Check if Teflon is not
torn and that no poly
builds up is present
and replace if
necessary
When checking Teflon
on rubber pads run
finger over pad and
ensure no indentations
present. Replace if
necessary
Check the condition of
draw rollers and
ensure free of wear
and foreign objects.
Ensure condition of
rollers is that so no
contamination will
occur. Replace draw
rollers if necessary.

check oil level. If oil is
below acceptable level

replace if necessary.

Packing Table

Conveyor Belt

Drive Belts

-

-

-

Check the condition of
table and ensure free
of wood chips, pieces
of fragmented plastic
and other foreign
objects. Ensure
condition of table is
that so no
contamination will
occur. Repair surface if
any damage to
surface.
Check the condition of
belt and ensure free of
fray. Ensure condition
of belt is that so no
contamination will
occur. Trim with cutter
knife if any signs of
wear.
Check for excessive
wear.

Maintenance
Check List

Verification
Method

Photo
Reference

•  Please ensure that the Blue cloth is always used for food contact surfaces when wiping down for post maintenance cleaning i.e. Aluminium Rollers,

Rubber Roller, and Punches & Packing Table.
If the Blue Cloth does get contaminated with grease and/or other lubricants, please discard of immediately and issue a new one.

•
•  Ensure that frames of machines, rails where excess grease may be, must be wiped down with a rag. This rag cannot be used for any food contact surfaces.
•  No Blue Cloths to be used for wiping of grease and other lubricants.
